about_the_game:
After years of careful production and development, "Fantasy Three Kingdoms and Eight Formations" is finally officially released for testing! This role-playing game will take you into the wars and politics of the Three Kingdoms chaotic times, allowing you to experience sandbox fun and exciting gameplay.

Game Features:
Immerse yourself in the chaos of the Three Kingdoms: Enter a world full of war and politics, and feel the strife and competition between the princes.
Important Persona: Play as an important person who can influence the entire situation, participate in the battle of princes, and use various talents and professional skills.
Recruit generals to form a lineup: Recruit unique generals, each with unique skills and characteristics. Combine them wisely to create a strong lineup.
Strategy determines victory: The combination of class strategy is a key element of the game, choose the right strategy according to the situation to restrain the enemy.
Multiple plot lines: The game provides multiple plot lines for players to choose from, join different princely factions, and experience different strategic strategies.

System Requirements:
Operating system: Windows 10 or above
Memory: 2GB or more
Storage: At least 1GB of free space

We value the feedback and opinions of our players. If you encounter any problems or have any suggestions in the game, please feel free to contact our customer service team. We are committed to supporting you and continuously improving the quality and experience of your games.
Thank you all for your continued support and attention! We hope that "Fantasy Three Kingdoms and Eight Formations" can bring you a pleasant gaming experience. Enjoy the fun of fighting and strategizing in the chaotic times of the Three Kingdoms!
